title: Paranormal and Religion - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/8/20
itunes:title: Paranormal and Religion - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/8/20
description:
George Noory and journalist Scott Smith discuss his work finding the link between religion and belief in a supernatural world and debate why so many people are skeptical of the paranormal.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
